channel.title: Buy 1 = 2? Buy 5 = 10? Buy 10 = 20?
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a glitch in my PKstore.
If i want to buy ONE item in my pkstore, it buys 2. And same with 5 and 10.
In other store's it DOESNT. Please help me,
thanks.

item.title: Buy 1 = 2? Buy 5 = 10? Buy 10 = 20?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

only this can i find with “additem” [code] addItem(itemID, 1);[/cde]

ther isnt something with ifbuy(item,4151,5);

please help me out,
thanks[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Buy 1 = 2? Buy 5 = 10? Buy 10 = 20?
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

check for your pk store in client.java. And check at its “return ###” things
Theres probably a code like
Ifbuy(item, 4151, 5);
return 10;[quote=“I D D S I, post:7, topic:277309”]of course there is A way.
But ye idk, i hope it can be fixed.

Thanks, I D D S I[/quote]

item.title: Buy 1 = 2? Buy 5 = 10? Buy 10 = 20?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

of my store?
here it is: [code] if (MyShopID == 1) {
if (pvppoints >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
pvppoints -= TotPrice2;
addItem(itemID, 1);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1)
> server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sendMsg(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
break;
}
} else {
sendMsg(“You don’t have enough pvp points.”);
break;
}
}
if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {

			deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
			addItem(itemID, 1);
			server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
			server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
			if ((fromSlot + 1)
				 > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
				server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
			}
		} else {
			sendMsg("Not enough space in your inventory.");
			break;
		}
	} else {
		sendMsg("You don't have enough coins.");
		break;
		}
	}[/code]
